title: Deckmaster

fields.name: Deck of Many Things (Passive):
fields.value: Each Night phase, you will draw a "hand" of cards depending on your score in the previous Evening. You will draw 1 card for every 10% you score, rounded to the nearest whole number. At the start of the Night, you will also discard your previous hand. You may play one card per phase, and once you play a card, it is removed from your deck. The list of cards can be found here, good luck hosts! <https://docs.google.com/document/d/13AeL-8P08ZuCBWvQNb3uQJksF2JvzSYIzHvPifK-NQs/edit?usp=sharing>

desc:
Post 155
*My deck is optimally crafted so I always win on turn 1. The game hasn't started and you've ALREADY LOST! HA!* (Concept taken from Guillo's Deck Mafia)
